name: Never Give Up! (Global Game Jam 2023)
description:
Never Give Up! is inspired by the legendary Shuzo Matsuoka, whose motivational and uplifting videos are legendary. The game revolves around rooting for the people of your hometown as they pass by your window. But... who's rooting for you?

This game requires a microphone and is purely driven by voice-input! 

This game is a short 5 minute experience made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023, specifically the Oslo branch of the game jam! Check out the game's page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/never-give-5

Need more of Shuzo Matsuoka in your life? Watch his best moments here:
